mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER_INFO( user_id, user_name, password, address, inv_code, attach_url, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

INSERT INTO T_USER_INFO( user_id, user_name, password, address, inv_code, attach_url, create_time, update_time ) VALUES
( #{tUserInfo.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tUserInfo.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUserInfo.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUserInfo.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUserInfo.invCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUserInfo.attachUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tUserInfo.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tUserInfo.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USER_INFO SET user_id = #{userId}, user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, address = #{address}, inv_code = #{invCode}, attach_url = #{attachUrl}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
